about.title: Hi, I'm Portia
paragraphs: Piquant is my definition of how I make food: in an exciting way! And that spicy doesn't mean hot. To me, flavours come in different shapes & colours.
I'm passionate about cooking & authenticity is key. Everything is handmade & homemade.
Hope to share all this & to see you enjoying my food soon!
